examples.text: Habeşler bir gece baskınında İtalyanlardan 10 tank, 12 top, birçok mitralyöz almışlar, yedi İtalyan zabitini öldürmüşler
examples.translation: During a nighttime raid, the Abyssinians seized ten tanks, twelve cannons, and an abundance of machine guns from the Italians. Seven Italian officers were killed in the process.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish مترالیوز, from French mitrailleuse in the late 19th century.
